Onboarding.introduction.msg_list: Before we get started, let's take a pause together.
Onboarding.importance.msg_list: üå± Parenting is the most demanding job you can have and it requires a lot of patience. When you're feeling stressed, taking a pause can help.
Onboarding.tips.intro: Whew. That feels better! You can take a pause with Your Child or on your own any time your need to cool down.¬†
Onboarding.video.message: Let‚Äôs take a pause, together. ‚ñ∂Ô∏èPress Play
Onboarding.audio.message: Let‚Äôs take a pause, together. ‚ñ∂Ô∏èPress Play
Onboarding.congratulations.msg_list: You are doing great, @fields.first_user_name. You've learnt the first tool for positive parenting: taking a pause.

Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.introduction.msg_list: This lesson is about how you can be more involved in caregiving responsibilities. üëã
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.importance.msg_list: Participating in caregiving responsibilities can improve your relationship with Your Child and make life less stressful for you and your partner. It can also make being a father more enjoyable for you! üíö
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.quiz.content.1.question: Participating in caregiving responsibilities is the role of a man in the family.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.quiz.content.1.feedback_correct:
üéâ You are right! 

It is important that men are also engaged in caregiving. This means more than working and providing money for food, clothes, and housing. 

Being an involved parent builds a strong connection between you and Your Child. 

Participating in caregiving and household work also shows that you respect fairness and equal relationships.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.quiz.content.1.feedback_incorrect:
üëÄ Oops! Check it out! 

It is important that men are also engaged in caregiving. This means more than working and providing money for food, clothes, and housing. 

Being an involved parent builds a strong connection between you and Your Child. 

Participating in caregiving and household work also shows that you respect fairness and equal relationships.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.intro: Here is a comic that shows how you can participate in caregiving responsibilities as a man in the family:
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.1:
{F1_FATHER}: {F1_MOTHER}, is it time for you to work on your studies? How about I spend some time with {F1_DAUGHTER_6} so you can concentrate?


{F1_MOTHER}: Thanks, my dear. I would appreciate that.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.2:
{F1_MOTHER} is studying in the background 

{F1_FATHER}: I see you are playing quietly with your blocks, {F1_DAUGHTER_6}. You are building such a strong and tall wall. 

{F1_DAUGHTER_6}: It is for the chickens.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.3:
{F1_FATHER}: It will keep them safe!

{F1_DAUGHTER_6}: Now you can help me build a house for our family to sleep in!
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.4:
{F1_FATHER}: This house is going to keep our family dry from the rains. You are such a good building {F1_DAUGHTER_6}!

{F1_DAUGHTER_6}: Yay!
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.5:
{F1_MOTHER}: Thank you, my love, for spending time with {F1_DAUGHTER_6} while I was finishing up my studies. I really appreciate it!

{F1_FATHER}: No problem! We had such a fun time!
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.intro: Here are some simple ways you can be more involved in caregiving responsibilities
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.message.1.text:
1Ô∏è‚É£ **CREATE A ROUTINE!** 

‚è∞ This can be hard to remember! Establishing a routine around caregiving or housework tasks can sometimes be helpful. 

üòÉ Even 5 minutes per day with each child can make a difference..
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.message.2.text:
2Ô∏è‚É£ **TALK ABOUT THE WORKLOAD WITH YOUR PARTNER**

üòÉ Talking with your partner about how you can be more involved in caregiving responsibilities helps both of you understand each other better. 

üíõ It also shows that you care!
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.message.3.text:
3Ô∏è‚É£ **OFFER SUPPORT**

üòí It can be hard to remember to offer support. 

üå∑ Be kind to yourself if you forget to ask and try again another time. 

‚≠ê Offering support to be more involved in caregiving responsibilities benefits the whole family!
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.video.message:
Press Play ‚ñ∂Ô∏èto learn some simple ways you can start sharing family responsibilities with your partner

1Ô∏è‚É£ **CREATE A ROUTINE!**
2Ô∏è‚É£ **TALK ABOUT THE WORKLOAD WITH YOUR PARTNER**
3Ô∏è‚É£ **OFFER SUPPORT**
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.audio.message:
Press Play ‚ñ∂Ô∏èto learn some simple ways you can start sharing family responsibilities with your partner

1Ô∏è‚É£ **CREATE A ROUTINE!**
2Ô∏è‚É£ **TALK ABOUT THE WORKLOAD WITH YOUR PARTNER**
3Ô∏è‚É£ **OFFER SUPPORT **
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.home_activity.activity: Home Activity! ‚≠ê Discuss with your partner ways for you to be more involved in caregiving and household responsibilities! Do you have time to do it today?
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.home_activity.positive_msg: Excellent job! Being more involved as a father in family time benefits the whole family. üéâ
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.home_activity.negative_msg:
Trying something new can be hard! To make it easier, start by asking your partner if you can spend time with your children together the first few times.

You or your partner can also start by taking responsibility for other household tasks, like washing plates or sweeping the house. 

Every little step will get you close to building a healthy and balanced relationship with your partner.

‚≠ê Remember you can refer back to this content in the Main Menu.

Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.introduction.msg_list: This lesson is about becoming a confident and supportive partner as a father. üíö
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.importance.msg_list: When both fathers and mothers are engaged in parenting their girls, boys, and teens, everyone benefits. üòÉ
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.quiz.content.1.question: It is only the role of the mother and not the father to parent a child. üíö
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.quiz.content.1.feedback_correct:
üéâ You are right! 

Parenting is not only the role of a mother - fathers play an important part, too! 

When both mothers and fathers are involved in parenting their girls, boys, and teens,  everyone benefits! üå∑
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.quiz.content.1.feedback_incorrect:
üëÄOops! Check it out! 

Parenting is not only the role of a mother - fathers play an important part, too! 

When both mothers and fathers are involved in parenting their girls, boys, and teens,  everyone benefits! üå∑
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.intro:
Here is a comic that shows how you can be a supportive partner and involved parent:

It's almost bedtime, dad is supervising that {F1_DAUGHTER_6} finishes his homework. Mom just got home from work.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.1: {F1_FATHER}: Good job, {F1_DAUGHTER_6}! You are reading very fluently!
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.2: {F1_FATHER}: Hello, my dear. We were just working on {F1_DAUGHTER_6}‚Äôs homework. How was your day?}{F1_MOTHER}: It has been a very hard day, my little feet hurt and we still have to prepare the children's lunch.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.3: {F1_FATHER}:  You should rest. I will take care of lunch and keep an eye on {F1_DAUGHTER_6} on her homework.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.4:
{F1_MOTHER}: That would be wonderful, my love! Thank you for being so helpful.

{F1_FATHER}: Of course! We are here to support each other.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.intro: Here are some simple ways you can become a more confident and supportive partner and parent:
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.message.1.text:
1Ô∏è‚É£ **PAY ATTENTION**

Try to be aware of how your partner is feeling and notice if they need support. 

Give your partner your full attention when you are speaking with them.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.message.2.text:
2Ô∏è‚É£ **WORK TOGETHER**

üòÉ Unsure how to work together with your partner? Ask them! 

‚úÖ By asking, you show that you care and want to be involved!
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.message.3.text:
3Ô∏è‚É£ **OFFER SUPPORT**

üëãIt can sometimes be difficult to remember to ask your partner if they need help. 

It can be as simple as asking, ‚ÄúHow can I help?‚Äù Try to listen to them and respond in a supportive way.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.message.4.text:
4Ô∏è‚É£ **ASK FOR SUPPORT**

üòí It is also important to ask for support when you need it, too. Sometimes, we expect our partners to know we need support even if we don‚Äôt ask them.

When you need support, tell your partner how you feel and what worries you. This helps them understand what you need.  

‚≠ê Once you start asking for support, they will likely start offering to help more in the future! 

üíö Thank your partner!
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.video.message:
Press Play ‚ñ∂Ô∏èto learn some simple ways you can become a more confident and supportive partner and parent.

1Ô∏è‚É£ **PAY ATTENTION**
2Ô∏è‚É£ **WORK TOGETHER**
3Ô∏è‚É£ **OFFER SUPPORT**
4Ô∏è‚É£ **ASK FOR SUPPORT**
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.audio.message:
Press Play ‚ñ∂Ô∏èto learn some simple ways you can become a more confident and supportive partner and parent.

1Ô∏è‚É£ **PAY ATTENTION**
2Ô∏è‚É£ **WORK TOGETHER**
3Ô∏è‚É£ **OFFER SUPPORT**
4Ô∏è‚É£ **ASK FOR SUPPORT**
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.home_activity.activity: Home activity! ‚≠êTry to notice when your partner needs support. Ask them what they need and be prepared to listen.Do you have time to do it today?
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.home_activity.negative_msg:
Sometimes, it can be hard to do this when we are very busy in our own lives. Spending even a few moments one-on-one with your partner can make a big difference.

‚≠êRemember you can refer back to this lesson in the Main Menu.

Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.introduction.msg_list: This lesson is about how you and your partner can listen and talk to each other in a positive way. üíô
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.importance.msg_list:
Listening and talking to those around us are key to a more peaceful home. üëÇ
Talking to your partner about issues before they become bigger problems can help avoid arguments from building up. üíõ
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.quiz.content.1.question: Talking to and listening to your partner can help prevent conflict
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.quiz.content.1.feedback_correct:
üéâThat‚Äôs correct! 

Sharing how we feel and talking about the difficulties we‚Äôre facing makes everyone in the family stronger! 

When you listen and talk to your partner, you can support each other more and help reduce conflict!
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.quiz.content.1.feedback_incorrect:
üëÄ Oops! Check it out! 

Sharing how we feel and talking about the difficulties we‚Äôre facing makes everyone in the family stronger! 

When you listen and talk to your partner, you can support each other more and help reduce conflict!
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.intro: Here is a comic that shows how partners can listen and talk to each other in a supportive and loving way:
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.1:
{F1_FATHER}: Are you okay, my love? You look tired.

{F1_MOTHER}: I didn‚Äôt sleep well last night, and so I am feeling quite tired.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.2:
{F1_FATHER}: I am sorry to hear that, {F1_MOTHER}: Is there anything I can do to help?

{F1_MOTHER}: I might try and get an earlier rest this evening.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.3: {F1_FATHER}: I can take over the children‚Äôs bedtime routine after dinner tonight so that you can get some extra rest.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.4: {F1_MOTHER}: That would be lovely. Thank you so much, my dear.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.intro: Here are some tips on how you and your partner can listen and talk with each other in a supportive and loving way:
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.message.1.text:
1Ô∏è‚É£ **LISTEN TO YOUR PARTNER**

Try to notice how your partner is feeling when they are talking to you. 

Listen with an open mind and try not to judge them. Ask yourself, ‚ÄúWhat do they need?‚Äù

üíö If you listen to your partner with an open mind, it will be easier to know how you can support them.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.message.2.text:
2Ô∏è‚É£ **SHARE HOW YOU FEEL**

üèÜ It is okay to also share how you feel. 

Sharing how we feel and talking about the difficulties we‚Äôre facing is a sign of strength and can make everyone in the family stronger! 

üíö By sharing emotions, you can better understand and support each other.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.message.3.text:
3Ô∏è‚É£ **BE KIND TO YOURSELF AND YOUR PARTNER**

üò£ Remember that you are in this together. Being gentle and kind shows inner strength.. 

‚è∞ Physical touch like a hug or saying to yourself or your partner, ‚ÄúI care,‚Äù can make a difference
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.message.4.text:
4Ô∏è‚É£ **CHOOSE A TIME WHEN YOU FEEL COMFORTABLE**

üíö It‚Äôs okay if you don't always want to share your emotions. 

üå∑ You can choose to share how you‚Äôre feeling at a later time once you feel calmer.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.video.message:
Press Play ‚ñ∂Ô∏è to learn some tips on how you and your partner can listen and talk with each other in a supportive and loving way:

1Ô∏è‚É£ **LISTEN TO YOUR PARTNER**
2Ô∏è‚É£ **SHARE HOW YOU FEEL**
3Ô∏è‚É£ **BE KIND TO YOURSELF AND YOUR PARTNER**
4Ô∏è‚É£ **CHOOSE A TIME WHEN YOU FEEL COMFORTABLE**
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.audio.message:
Press Play ‚ñ∂Ô∏è to learn some tips on how you and your partner can listen and talk with each other in a supportive and loving way:

1Ô∏è‚É£ **LISTEN TO YOUR PARTNER**
2Ô∏è‚É£ **SHARE HOW YOU FEEL**
3Ô∏è‚É£ **BE KIND TO YOURSELF AND YOUR PARTNER**
4Ô∏è‚É£ **CHOOSE A TIME WHEN YOU FEEL COMFORTABLE**
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.home_activity.activity: Home Activity!‚≠ê Try setting aside some time to talk to your partner about your feelings and any difficulties you‚Äôre facing. You can also share positive things, too! Do you have time to do it today?
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.home_activity.positive_msg: Good for you! Talking about challenges and our emotions can be hard. You are doing great! üéâ
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.home_activity.negative_msg:
Talking about our feelings and the challenges we‚Äôre facing can help others understand and support us better. 

Emotions and challenges are a part of life, and learning how to handle them can help make life less stressful. 

‚òï Remember you can refer back to this content in the Main Menu.

Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.introduction.msg_list:
This lesson is about how you and your partner can make decisions together. 

‚≠êFamily and friends might tell you how a partner or a parent should act. But both men and women benefit when they talk to each other and make decisions together. 
For example, next time a decision needs to be made, involve your partner and ask what they think.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.importance.msg_list:
When you make decisions together, you are making your relationship with your partner stronger by communicating better and showing respect to each other more. 

This also has a big impact on how you feel and can help Your Child feel loved and safe. 

You are also showing Your Child how to share their thoughts and listen to others. üòÉ
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.quiz.content.1.question: Important decisions that impact the whole family or the relationship should only be made by one partner.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.quiz.content.1.feedback_correct:
üéâ You are right! 

üîë Communicating and making big decisions together with our partner is an important part of having a healthy relationship.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.quiz.content.1.feedback_incorrect:
üëÄOops! Check it out!

üîë Communicating and making big decisions together with our partner is an important part of having a healthy relationship.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.intro: Here is a comic that shows how partners can share their opinions as equals and make decisions together.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.1:
{F1_FATHER}: My dear, you look worried. What‚Äôs wrong?
{F1_MOTHER}: I just did our family budget and am concerned that we do not have enough money to get through the month.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.2:
{F1_FATHER}:   Oh no, we may need to cut back a bit to make sure we can afford to buy the things that we absolutely need.

{F1_MOTHER}: I was thinking the same thing. Perhaps we should make a list of the things we are spending money on.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.3:
{F1_FATHER}: That is a great idea. I am sure that together we can find a way to save. Thank you for letting me know.

{F1_MOTHER}: I also appreciate that we can do this together, my love.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.4:
(An hour later‚Ä¶){F1_FATHER}: Well, it will not be easy to give up some of these things but at least we have a plan to make sure we have enough for the things we and our children need. I feel a bit better now. 

{F1_MOTHER} (smiling): Me too. I feel a lot better now that we have talked about it together.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.intro: Here are some steps that you and your partner can do to communicate better and make decisions as a team:
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.message.1.text:
1Ô∏è‚É£ **SHARE DECISION MAKING**

üí°Next time, before making a decision, talk with your partner as a team. 

üëÇ Ask your partner what they think, and share your thoughts too.  

üòÉ Consider the options you have and reach an agreement.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.message.2.text:
2Ô∏è‚É£ **INVOLVE YOUR PARTNER**

üò£ It can sometimes be hard to remember to involve our partners in decision-making. 

üîÑ If you forget, talk about it with your partner and keep trying! 

‚≠ê It is important that both participate and share the responsibility of the family. This shows that both of you care about each other and want to be involved together.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.message.3.text:
3Ô∏è‚É£ **TIMING MAKES A DIFFERENCE**
 
‚è∞ If you have a decision to make, bring it up during a time when you and your partner are not too busy, such as early in the morning or later in the evening. 

‚òÄÔ∏è Find a moment in which both are calm and open to listening and talking.

üö© If the conversation starts getting difficult, you can agree to take a pause and find another time to continue talking. 

Remember to think about the different options you have and what is in the best interest of the family.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.message.4.text:
4Ô∏è‚É£ **PRACTICE MAKES IMPROVEMENTS**

‚è∞ It can take time to get used to making decisions together. 

üîÑ Give yourself time and keep trying! 
It‚Äôs okay not to be perfect. Both of you might make mistakes, and that‚Äôs alright. Recognise the mistakes, and try again. üèÜ 

üòÉ Remember that by communicating with your partner, you will both eventually start to feel more comfortable talking and sharing decisions.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.video.message:
Press Play ‚ñ∂Ô∏èto learn about some steps that you and your partner can do to communicate better and make decisions as a team:

1Ô∏è‚É£ **SHARE DECISION MAKING**
2Ô∏è‚É£ **INVOLVE YOUR PARTNER**
3Ô∏è‚É£ **TIMING MAKES A DIFFERENCE**
4Ô∏è‚É£ **PRACTICE MAKES IMPROVEMENTS**
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.audio.message:
Press Play ‚ñ∂Ô∏èto learn about some steps that you and your partner can do to communicate better and make decisions as a team:

1Ô∏è‚É£ **SHARE DECISION MAKING**
2Ô∏è‚É£ **INVOLVE YOUR PARTNER**
3Ô∏è‚É£ **TIMING MAKES A DIFFERENCE**
4Ô∏è‚É£ **PRACTICE MAKES IMPROVEMENTS**
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.home_activity.activity: Home Activity! ‚≠ê Your home activity is to involve your partner in a decision you are making today. Can you do it?  ‚è∞
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.home_activity.positive_msg: üéâ Well done! Communicating and working together with your partner makes a difference!
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.home_activity.negative_msg:
It can take time to get used to making decisions together. Give yourself time to adjust. 

Remember that communicating with your partner and involving them in decision-making will help them feel more comfortable doing so, too. 

‚≠ê You can refer back to this lesson in the Main Menu.

Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.introduction.msg_list: This lesson is about resolving conflict peacefully between you and your partner. üíö
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.importance.msg_list: All adults have disagreements sometimes. Fighting is not an effective way to solve issues. Learning to respond in a calmer way when experiencing disagreements with your partner can help you create a more peaceful home.üå∑
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.quiz.content.1.question: When facing a disagreement, taking a pause before responding can help us stay calm and respond better.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.quiz.content.1.feedback_correct:
üéâ That‚Äôs correct! 

It can be really hard to stay calm when we‚Äôre having a disagreement with others. So, taking a pause, such as by taking a couple of deep breaths, can be a useful way to help us respond better.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.quiz.content.1.feedback_incorrect:
üëÄ Oops! Check it out!

It can be really hard to stay calm when we‚Äôre having a disagreement with others. So, taking a pause, such as by taking a couple of deep breaths, can be a useful way to help us respond better.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.intro: Here is a comic that shows how you can resolve conflict peacefully:
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.1:
{F2_SON_8}: Look, it is raining!

{F2_GRANDMOTHER}: Oh no! We left the laundry outside!
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.2:
{F2_GRANDFATHER}: I thought you said you would bring in the laundry today.

{F2_GRANDMOTHER}: No, I was busy cooking dinner! You told me you would take care of it! How could you forget? Now all the laundry is wet!

{F2_GRANDFATHER}: I‚Äôm really sorry. It was a mistake!
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.3:
{F2_GRANDMOTHER}(thinking): I can‚Äôt believe he forgot! But everyone can make mistakes. Take a deep breath‚Ä¶

{F2_GRANDFATHER} (thinking): Let me take a deep breath. She has been busy all day. I shouldn‚Äôt be angry and should apologize.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.comic.text.4:
{F2_GRANDMOTHER}: I‚Äôm sorry if I raised my voice. I just got stressed because I have had a long day.

{F2_GRANDFATHER}: I am sorry that I forgot the laundry. I know you have had a long day. I will make sure to take care of it after dinner.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.intro: Here are some tips you can try to resolve conflicts with your partner in a peaceful way:
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.message.1.text:
1Ô∏è‚É£ **TAKE A PAUSE**

‚è∏ On the first day of Crianza con Conciencia +, you learned to close your eyes, breathe deeply, and take a pause. 

üòÉ Taking a pause before responding can help us stay calm and respond better a little later. 

Take a moment to notice how you are feeling and what you are thinking.

üå∑ When you feel yourself getting angry, try taking a pause. You can do this!
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.message.2.text:
2Ô∏è‚É£ **SHARE HOW YOU FEEL**

Share how you feel in a calm way. You can start by saying ‚ÄúI feel‚Ä¶‚Äù

Try to keep the focus on how you feel instead of what your partner is doing or saying. 

Ask yourself what you need. Try to notice what your partner needs.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.tips.message.3.text:
3Ô∏è‚É£ **WALK AWAY IF NECESSARY**

üò£ Sometimes, others respond to us negatively when we‚Äôre having a disagreement.

‚ùó In these situations, especially if you feel fearful or threatened, it may be best to walk away for a bit until everyone has calmed down.
;
Remember, if you need help in a crisis, you can type {HELP} in Crianza con Conciencia + to receive a list of community resources where you may find support.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.video.message:
Press Play ‚ñ∂Ô∏è to learn some tips you can try to resolve conflicts with your partner in a peaceful way

1Ô∏è‚É£ **TAKE A PAUSE**
2Ô∏è‚É£ **SHARE HOW YOU FEEL**
3Ô∏è‚É£ **WALK AWAY IF NECESSARY**
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.audio.message:
Press Play ‚ñ∂Ô∏è to learn some tips you can try to resolve conflicts with your partner in a peaceful way

1Ô∏è‚É£ **TAKE A PAUSE**
2Ô∏è‚É£ **SHARE HOW YOU FEEL**
3Ô∏è‚É£ **WALK AWAY IF NECESSARY**
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.home_activity.activity:
Home Activity! 
‚≠ê Today‚Äôs home activity is to practise taking a pause. Do you have time to practise taking a pause today?
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.home_activity.positive_msg: üå±Good job! Taking a pause and staying calm is a great way to reduce conflicts.
Being a More Responsible and Involved Ca.home_activity.negative_msg:
üîë It can be really hard to stay calm when we‚Äôre having a disagreement with others. 
Try to think of something that you can do that might help, like take a couple of deep breaths. Remember, you can refer back to this content in the Main Menu.
